title: Andrew Schulz Answers "Why Comedy Must Be Offensive"

itunes:summary: What up people, Schulzy here with Mark Gagnon. Today we gonna talk about WHY quarantine is so difficult, why giving Native Americans smallpox blankets might be a myth, and we get to the BOTTOM of oxygen. INDULGE.
